channel.title: Games/Old Games you like to see Continued
channel.description:
List Games/Old Games you like to see continued (they can be recent or old games and on any platform)
Blood Nightmare Creatures Hexen Hugo House of Horror Cyberia Microsoft Fury 3 Half Life 2 series (LOL JK!!)

item.title: Games/Old Games you like to see Continued
item.dc:creator: Maxx_Skywalker
item.description:
flyaway888:

Manhunt 2? not everything is fuzzy

Then you must have played the PC version. I know Rockstar released the PC version as uncensored.

Though I enjoyed it. I actually found the censorship to be humorous and fitting to the over the top gratuitous nature to the game. Simply because it’s essentially saying, “oh we have to censor ourselves because some righteous prick says we have to, so we’ll make it as ridiculous as possible.”

And it was a fun game to boot.

Read full topic
item.source: Games/Old Games you like to see Continued

item.title: Games/Old Games you like to see Continued
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
MechWarrior.

  • The Mech costumization options from Mechwarrior 2 and 3.
    [COLOR=‘red’]Make a step backwards compared to Mechwarrior 4? No.
  • MW4 was too cartoony in my opinion.
    [COLOR=‘red’]It wasn’t. Moreover, mech models and animations were the best in the series.
  • A soundtrack from Jeehun Hwang (MW2 series).
    [COLOR=‘Red’]Duane Decker was cooler, but nothing would beat the amalgam of them and that guy who did music for mw4:mercs
  • Ooh… and melee combat on capable Mech’s, like in the novels… Having an Atlas pick up and smash a 25 ton light Mech is pure awesomenesss.
    [COLOR=‘red’]Hell fucking no.

Read full topic

item.source: Games/Old Games you like to see Continued

item.title: Games/Old Games you like to see Continued
item.dc:creator: Mr.Night
item.description:
Oh come on! Nobody ever heard of Legacy of Kain? This game series has one of the best story lines ever and yet, it’s about vampires. This totally beats the shit out of any modern vampire story you can think of. Though I don’t see how it could be continued, I’d like to see more of it. Too bad the two companies involved got mad at each other.

Basically, the game isn’t as much gameplay as story telling, it’s full of cutscenes and yet, it’s much better than what it sounds. The gameplay combines puzzle and combat and honestly, I get stuck at almost each new puzzle as the series progress. And the first game is even 2D!

I definitely recommend this game. Hope these get you involved:

LoK: Blood Omen 1 intro Pt.1
LoK: Blood Omen 1 intro Pt.2
LoK: Soul Reaver 1 intro

Read full topic

item.title: Games/Old Games you like to see Continued
item.dc:creator: Ragnatas
item.description:
TomasWolf:

I’m not sure if they’re doing this or not, but Contra. I loved how Shattered Soldier had references to Contra 3, but I don’t know if any other game came after it or not.

They made a new contra but it’s all in japanese and I forget the name of it. If you have a nintendo wii and it’s homebrewed you can probably get it with a lot of other things.
